Full Moon Laboratory

満(まん)月(げつ)の(の)実(じっ)験(けん)室(しつ)mangetsu no jikkenshitsu

"Loneliness in Laboratory"

"On the night of the full moon the experiment begins."
R

The story of a girl performing experiments.

Lyrics

Versions

  • Original: The original version uploaded to niconico on February 25, 2010, and later featured on Evil Food Eater Conchita (revised) and EVILS EXTRA.

Albums

Notes

  • The lyrics reference Wordplay's lyrics, including the partial lulila motif, along with Clockwork Lullaby's lyrics.
  • The PV features the illustration seen in Wordplay.
  • The PV uses contrasting red and blue symbolism.
  • The song was paired up with That King was Born from Mud in supplementary material for EVILS EXTRA.
